content: looking for a quick and easy crochet project that delivers cozy stylish results this easy chunky crochet blanket pattern is perfect for beginners and experienced crocheters alike with 4 versatile sizes included in this pdf you can make a blanket for any occasion whether it s a small lap throw or a large snuggly bedspread this is a crochet pattern for the mystical blanket a simple and stylish blanket perfect to make for any house warming gift or as a treat to yourself the blanket is crocheted using us single_crochet and half_double_crochet stitches pattern features sizes included lovey 30 x 36 crib 40 x 60 lapghan 45 x 50 throw 60 x 72 skill level easy stitch half_double_crochet and single_crochet instant pdf download with 10 pages adjustable sizing and border options full video tutorial to support written pattern if you are a visual learner us crochet terms uk stitch conversion chart why you ll love this pattern quick and easy works up quickly using super chunky yarn
